creator: OwnGames
descriptionHtml:
The Master Mods and Maps for Minecraft 2022 application contains more than 3 thousand free mods, more than 5 thousand maps and a huge number of addons, skins and textures for Minecraft PE.
Master Mod and Map for Minecraft 2022 will help diversify your stay in Minecraft PE. Choose from the variety of mods and maps that you like, install in one click and enjoy a completely different game.
The Master Mod and Map app for Minecraft 2022 features a complete collection of new free mods, maps, textures that will completely change your view of Minecraft PE.

Weapons and Armor:
Replenish your combat supply of weapons for Minecraft PE. Choose for yourself multifunctional and beautiful weapon models for Minecraft PE, among which you can find:
- AK47 (quick shots)
- AUG (weapon with scope)
- Crossbow (shoots arrows)
- Machete (weapon does a lot of damage)
- Glock (pistol)
- M16A4, Makarov, Minigun (this weapon is easy to get in a workbench)
- MP5, Rocket Launcher, Beam Gun,
- RPG, Scorpion (huge damage)
- Winter sniper (sniper rifle) and more.
Armor mods prevent direct hits from bullets and explosions from TNT. The application presents various mods for armor of various shapes and colors. You will definitely choose something interesting for yourself!

Survival and Adventure:
Monotonous games quickly get bored, but survival and adventure mods are designed to diversify the game in Minecraft PE!
Download all known survival maps for Minecraft:
- One block;
- Zombie survival;
- Survival in the sea;
- Sunken island;
- Survival on the planet;
- Mysterious castle and much more.

Tanks, planes, cars and ships:
In the Master Mods and Maps for Minecraft 2022 application, you will find mods that allow you to control various vehicles in Minecraft PE:
- Various types of tanks;
- Various types of special equipment;
- Boats, boats, cruise ships;
- Various helicopters;
- Sport Car, fire truck and ambulance, trucks, etc.

Animals:
Experiment in the Master Mods and Maps for Minecraft 2022 application: thanks to animal mods, you will have the opportunity to tame animals, ride them, use them as food or get protection from them.
For a better immersion in the game, you are provided with a package of different textures:
- Safari;
- Ocean;
- Mountains and others.
Each animal in fashion is unique! They have different sleep and wake patterns (depending on the time of day), some of them can be tamed, and some must be avoided, as they are able to attack the player.
Thanks to Master Mods and Maps for Minecraft 2022, you can interact with herbivores, carnivores and representatives of the underwater world!

Furniture:
Everything you are used to in real life is now in your phone! Mods and maps in the application Master Mods and Maps for Minecraft 2022 will allow you to equip your house in Minecraft.
Now you can use ready-made decorations or create each room of the house, non-residential premises or public space with your own hands.
Your imagination, mods and maps from the Master Mods and Maps for Minecraft 2022 application can create unimaginable buildings for different needs!

Textures:
The Master Mods and Maps for Minecraft 2022 application contains a huge number of free and most popular textures for Minecraft.
In the textures for minecraft pe you will find the following permissions:
- Faithful
- 16x16
- 32x32
- 64x64
- 128x128
- 256x256
-Full HD
- Shaders
Change the standard textures and lighting, add highlights, shine and glow for a more realistic game.
Textures and Shaders in Minecraft PE will breathe new life into your game!

DISCLAIMER: This is an unofficial application for Minecraft Pocket Edition.
This application is not affiliated in any way with Mojang AB. The Minecraft Name, the Minecraft Brand and the Minecraft Assets are all property of Mojang AB or their respectful owner.
All rights reserved. In accordance with http://account.mojang.com/documents/brand_guidelines
descriptionShort: Master Mods and Maps for Minecraft 2022 contains over 3 thousand mods and Maps.

- Boats, boats, cruise ships;
- Various helicopters;
- Sport Car, fire truck and ambulance, trucks, etc.

Animals:
Experiment in the Master Mods and Maps for Minecraft 2022 application: thanks to animal mods, you will have the opportunity to tame animals, ride them, use them as food or get protection from them.
For a better immersion in the game, you are provided with a package of different textures:
- Safari;
- Ocean;
- Mountains and others.
Each animal in fashion is unique! They have different sleep and wake patterns (depending on the time of day), some of them can be tamed, and some must be avoided, as they are able to attack the player.
Thanks to Master Mods and Maps for Minecraft 2022, you can interact with herbivores, carnivores and representatives of the underwater world!

Furniture:
Everything you are used to in real life is now in your phone! Mods and maps in the application Master Mods and Maps for Minecraft 2022 will allow you to equip your house in Minecraft.
Now you can use ready-made decorations or create each room of the house, non-residential premises or public space with your own hands.
Your imagination, mods and maps from the Master Mods and Maps for Minecraft 2022 application can create unimaginable buildings for different needs!

Textures:
The Master Mods and Maps for Minecraft 2022 application contains a huge number of free and most popular textures for Minecraft.
In the textures for minecraft pe you will find the following permissions:
- Faithful
- 16x16
- 32x32
- 64x64
- 128x128
- 256x256
-Full HD
- Shaders
Change the standard textures and lighting, add highlights, shine and glow for a more realistic game.
Textures and Shaders in Minecraft PE will breathe new life into your game!

DISCLAIMER: This is an unofficial application for Minecraft Pocket Edition.
This application is not affiliated in any way with Mojang AB. The Minecraft Name, the Minecraft Brand and the Minecraft Assets are all property of Mojang AB or their respectful owner.
All rights reserved. In accordance with http://account.mojang.com/documents/brand_guidelines

descriptionHtml:
The Master Mods and Maps for Minecraft 2023 application contains more than 3 thousand free mods, more than 5 thousand maps and a huge number of addons, skins and textures for Minecraft PE.
Master Mod and Map for Minecraft 2023 will help diversify your stay in Minecraft PE. Choose from the variety of mods and maps that you like, install in one click and enjoy a completely different game.
The Master Mod and Map app for Minecraft 2023 features a complete collection of new free mods, maps, textures that will completely change your view of Minecraft PE.

Weapons and Armor:
Replenish your combat supply of weapons for Minecraft PE. Choose for yourself multifunctional and beautiful weapon models for Minecraft PE, among which you can find:
- AK47 (quick shots)
- AUG (weapon with scope)
- Crossbow (shoots arrows)
- Machete (weapon does a lot of damage)
- Glock (pistol)
- M16A4, Makarov, Minigun (this weapon is easy to get in a workbench)
- MP5, Rocket Launcher, Beam Gun,
- RPG, Scorpion (huge damage)
- Winter sniper (sniper rifle) and more.
Armor mods prevent direct hits from bullets and explosions from TNT. The application presents various mods for armor of various shapes and colors. You will definitely choose something interesting for yourself!

Survival and Adventure:
Monotonous games quickly get bored, but survival and adventure mods are designed to diversify the game in Minecraft PE!
Download all known survival maps for Minecraft:
- One block;
- Zombie survival;
- Survival in the sea;
- Sunken island;
- Survival on the planet;
- Mysterious castle and much more.

Tanks, planes, cars and ships:
In the Master Mods and Maps for Minecraft 2023 application, you will find mods that allow you to control various vehicles in Minecraft PE:
- Various types of tanks;
- Various types of special equipment;

- Various helicopters;
- Sport Car, fire truck and ambulance, trucks, etc.

Animals:

For a better immersion in the game, you are provided with a package of different textures:

Each animal in fashion is unique! They have different sleep and wake patterns (depending on the time of day), some of them can be tamed, and some must be avoided, as they are able to attack the player.
Thanks to Master Mods and Maps for Minecraft 2023, you can interact with herbivores, carnivores and representatives of the underwater world!

Furniture:
Everything you are used to in real life is now in your phone! Mods and maps in the application Master Mods and Maps for Minecraft 2023 will allow you to equip your house in Minecraft.
Now you can use ready-made decorations or create each room of the house, non-residential premises or public space with your own hands.
Your imagination, mods and maps from the Master Mods and Maps for Minecraft 2023 application can create unimaginable buildings for different needs!

Textures:
The Master Mods and Maps for Minecraft 2023 application contains a huge number of free and most popular textures for Minecraft.
In the textures for minecraft pe you will find the following permissions:
- Faithful
- 16x16
- 32x32
- 64x64
- 128x128
- 256x256
-Full HD
- Shaders
Change the standard textures and lighting, add highlights, shine and glow for a more realistic game.
Textures and Shaders in Minecraft PE will breathe new life into your game!
